name: 1/2-inch Digital Torque Wrench(3.8-250.8Ft.Lb/5.1-340Nm) ±1% Accuracy Digital Torque Wrench with Vibration, Buzzer,LED Notification and Five Units of Measure, for Car,Motorcycle Repair, DIY
short_description: 【High Accuracy & Colorful Large Digital Display】: SUERCUP digital torque wrench is 3.8-250.8Ft.Lb/5.1-340Nm, with an accuracy of up to ± 1%. The digital display screen with backlight has been upgraded, and the large color digital LED display screen makes it easier for users to read and operate numerical values when using, even in low light, poor visibility, and dark environments.

【Introduction of P/T Mode】: In Track Mode T, the indicator value changes in real-time according to the magnitude of the applied force, displaying the current torque value. After releasing the force, the displayed value is zero. You can adjust and control the torque accurately as needed. In Peak Mode, it records and displays the maximum torque value, suitable for tasks that require detecting and recording torque peaks, such as checking and calibrating torque wrenches or testing and debugging car engines. Tips Reminder: The loading torque value should not exceed 120% of the maximum torque value.

【Overload Protection (Vibration, Buzzer, Flashing)】: We reach our preset torque value when using adigital torque wrench in daily life, the wrench will have overload protection. At this time, the handle will vibrate significantly, the LED indicator light will flash, and the buzzer will beep, all of which remind you to stop applying pressure and avoid damage to the screw caused by excessive torque.

【9 Preset Modes & 5 Units of Use Switching】: The digital torque wrench has been upgraded based on the market, offering 9 preset modes (P1-P9). Simply press the U button to easily and quickly switch between five different units of use (N.m, lb.ft, lb IN, kg.cm, kg. m).In addition, torque value data can be automatically recorded after each use in peak mode, and up to 500 sets of data can be stored. Record the torque values of each of your work sessions, which can be viewed at any time, quickly and conveniently, improving work efficiency and quality.

【Quick Release Design】: The ratchet head of this digital torque wrench adopts a quick release design, which does not require additional tools or disassembly of the entire torque wrench, making it easy to replace the socket.It can saves time and effort during the replacement process, and provides a smoother and more comfortable working experience. Widely used for daily maintenance and repair of bicycle,car,motorcycle repair,and home DIY etc. This digital torque wrench can install 2*AA batteries, providing longer working time. ﻿

name: TEKTON 1/2 Inch Drive 90-Tooth Dual-Direction Micrometer Torque Wrench (40-300 ft-lb) | TRQ52403
short_description: Accurate within ±3% for Both Directions – The actual calibration accuracy will be stated on the certificate for your wrench, but will be no worse than ±3%
Full-Range Calibration Using the ISO Standard – Since this torque wrench is calibrated to the ISO standard, it also meets and exceeds the ASME standard
Serialized Certificate of Calibration – Includes serial number, test results, and test equipment and conditions
90-Tooth Fixed Ratchet Head – The single half-moon pawl maintains 9 teeth engaged with the gear at all times, so it won't skip under stress and the 4-degree swing arc reduces length of travel
Easy-to-Read Micrometer Scales – The single-unit scale is marked with high-contrast laser markings on a satin-finished handle body to reduce glare
product_description: Tekton micrometer torque wrenches are designed to instill confidence in the wrench’s accuracy and control during operation. They are calibrated to be accurate within ±3% for both clockwise and counterclockwise directions and certified to the ISO standard for the full listed range (40 - 300 ft-lb), unlike torque wrenches calibrated to ASME standards, which do not require calibration below 20% of the listed range. The single half-moon pawl maintains 9 teeth engaged with the gear at all times, so it won't skip under stress. The internal components are the same design and construction as all of our 90-tooth ratchets. The 4-degree swing arc reduces the length of travel at the end of the wrench handle between each click. The micrometer scales are laser-marked in bold fonts on the satin-finished handle body, making them easy to read. The collar springs into a locked position that holds your setting and prevents accidental movement during operation. There is no thumb knob to tighten at the end of the handle. A deep, sharp-cut diamond pattern on the surface of the handle creates a coarse texture that won’t slip in your hand. The case provides safe transport for the torque wrench and protects it from drops. Each item in the case has its own place and is held securely. The case is made of high-density polyethylene (HDPE), and the latches are polypropylene (PP). Includes a serialized certificate of calibration.
